author:

Charlie Spiering
title: Watch Live: President Trump’s Coronavirus Task Force Holds Press Conference
description: The president and his team continue to answer questions about reopening the country during the ongoing fight against the virus as well as supporting Americans suffering the economic effects of the global pandemic.
content:
President Donald Trumps coronavirus task force will host a press briefing at the White House on Tuesday, scheduled for 5:45 p.m. EST.
